articles.title: Measles Cases In Europe Rise 45-Fold In 2023. These Countries Worst Hit - NDTV
articles.description: Measles cases soared in Europe in 2023 to 42,200, a nearly 45-fold increase over the previous year, the UN health agency said on Tuesday, calling for urgent vaccination efforts to halt the spread.
articles.content:
Vaccination rates against measles have been dropping across the globe.
